name: Apps
description: This plugin powers the Mattermost Apps Framework and is required for any Apps to run

settings_schema.header: To create your own Mattermost App, check out [the documentation](https://developers.mattermost.com/integrate/apps/)
settings_schema.footer: To report an issue, make a suggestion or a contribution, [check the repository](https://github.com/mattermost/mattermost-plugin-apps).
